alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 11:35AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Areas of the Fort Lauderdale Metro, including Dania Beach and Hollywood. * WHEN...Until 400 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1126 AM EDT, local law enforcement continued to report flooding and standing water in and around the greater Fort Lauderdale metro area due to yesterday`s significant rainfall. Rainfall amounts of up to 18 to 26 inches were observed in the area. - The standing water will continue to slowly recede, but additional rainfall will be possible in showers and thunderstorms this afternoon and evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Lauderhill, Dania Beach, Chula Vista, Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport, Ravenswood Estates, Melrose Park, Downtown Fort Lauderdale, Estates Of Fort Lauderdale, Washington Park, Broadview Park, Franklin Park, Port Everglades, Oak Point, Chambers Estates and St. George. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
